data.expected_result: You should see a generic “We couldn’t redeem your gift.” message
data.short_description: Discord crashes if you try to redeem a revoked gift link when it shows up as valid
data.steps_to_repro: - Generate a valid gift link on desktop - Send the gift link in a chat where no one will claim it on your phone - Go back to your inventory on desktop and revoke the gift link - Observe how the link still shows up as a valid gift link on your phone - Tap the link and then tap the accept button. - Observe
